node.title: 'Today your dad is going to kill me': Family violence victim's heartbreaking text to daughter before she was killed
node.alt: Signs speaking about community safety and freedom from domestic violence in Hidden Valley
node.description: The Northern Territory's top cop says police have to get better at combating spiralling rates of family violence as the murder of a woman by her partner is described as "about as horrific as it gets".
node.content:
["WARNING: This article contains content that some readers may find distressing.", "The Northern Territory's top policeman has spoken of a\u00a0\"sense of failure\" after a horrifying family violence murder\u00a0where the victim texted her daughter\u00a0to say, \"Your dad is going to kill me.\"", "NT Police Commissioner Jamie Chalker said the woman's\u00a0partner \"poured accelerant over the door and under the door and set it alight\", trapping her\u00a0inside with him.", "He said in the hours before she died, the victim\u00a0texted her young daughter to say goodbye.\u00a0", "Commissioner\u00a0Chalker was speaking at an anti-family violence event in Darwin, where he said police needed to \"do things far better\".", "The\u00a0woman\u2019s 36-year-old partner \u2013 who also died of burn injuries \u2013 was arrested three days before the fire for breaching a domestic violence order.", "He was granted bail by police before he killed the\u00a034-year-old woman at an Alice Springs town camp last month.", "
Worst it's been
", "Commissioner\u00a0Chalker said he felt \"a sense of failure\" over worsening rates of domestic violence in the Territory.\u00a0", "", "
Jamie Chalker says police\u00a0need to do things better when it comes to preventing family violence.(ABC: Hamish Harty)
", "He said the past year was the \"worst it's been\" and in the past decade NT police had responded to about 10,000\u00a0domestic violence incidents a year.\u00a0", "The woman was\u00a0the second in Alice Springs to die in an alleged domestic violence related homicide this year, following\u00a0the death in January\u00a0of\u00a0R Rubuntja, a prominent anti-domestic violence campaigner.\u00a0", "She is the third this year to die in the NT.\u00a0", "Larissa Ellis from Women's Safety Services Central Australia (WOSSCA) said the\u00a0woman's death, like all deaths as a result of domestic violence,\u00a0was \"entirely preventable\".", "The organisation is\u00a0reviewing its processes to determine if any improvements to its\u00a0service could have prevented the woman's death.\u00a0", "A\u00a0bed bug infestation\u00a0at the organisation's\u00a0specialised crisis accommodation meant it was closed the week the woman was killed.\u00a0", "The shelter is still taking on referrals and placing women in alternative accommodation, but Ms Ellis says\u00a0the accommodation's temporary closure will\u00a0be part of their review.\u00a0", "The murdered woman was also known to the Tennant Creek women's refuge.\u00a0", "", "
The woman was killed at this town camp last month.(ABC Alice Springs: Samantha Jonscher\u00a0)
", "
Funding welcomed
", "Indigenous women in the Northern Territory experience the highest rates of violence victimisation in the world and are hospitalised for assault at 40\u00a0times the rate of non-Indigenous women in Australia.\u00a0\u00a0", "In recognition of this, the sector recently received a 50 per cent boost in funding from the NT government, adding $15 million to the $26 million a year spent on tackling domestic violence in the NT.\u00a0", "On the frontline, Ms Ellis said she welcomed the additional funding but had questions about how and where it would be rolled out.", "", "
Larissa Ellis says every death from domestic violence is \"entirely preventable\".(Supplied:\u00a0 Larissa Ellis)
", "Ms Ellis said the present\u00a0level of funding resulted\u00a0in over-worked case workers, high levels of burnout, possible gaps in service and little capacity to prevent violence before it happened.\u00a0", "A recent report by the Equality Institute found primary prevention work that\u00a0stops violence before it happens almost always falls on frontline crisis\u00a0staff.\u00a0", "
Federal inquiry
", "Funding for domestic violence is awarded on a per capita basis, but Ms Ellis \u2014\u00a0like others in Northern Territory \u2014\u00a0has called on the government to award funding on a \"needs\" basis, given the Territory's small population.\u00a0", "", "
NT Labor Senator Malarndirri McCarthy was part of a push for a parliamentary inquiry into how resources are allocated to deal with First Nations family violence.\u00a0(ABC News: Matt Garrick)
", "These gaps in service will be considered at a new\u00a0parliamentary inquiry that will assess the disparity in resources allocated to murder and missing persons investigations involving First Nations women and children.", "Northern Territory Senator\u00a0Malarndirri McCarthy was part of the push for the inquiry and said she\u00a0would ensure it heard from Territorians on the frontline of family violence work.\u00a0", "\"That means families, nursing staff, police,\u00a0those organisations that look after families in these situations.", "
Coronial inquest
", "NT Police said an ongoing investigation would address \u201call aspects\u201d surrounding the deaths of the woman and the man, and that a file was being prepared for the coroner.", "Acting Alice Springs police commander Kirsten Engels separately described the incident as \u201cabout as horrific as it gets\".", "The Tennant Creeks Women's refuge did not respond to requests for comment.\u00a0"]
